NK039(ti)013:1: // ma mo dpal ldan lha mo'i mchod gsol rat+na'i phreng ba dge'o //
NK039(ti)013:2: rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis ma mo'i bsnyen bsgrub
NK039(ti)013:3: sngon du song ba'i dbang du byas nas skyems phud
NK039(ti)013:7: ram yam kham zhes lan gsum /
NK039(ti)013:8: h'u b+h+yoh ma ring yongs 'du dpag bsam ljon pa'i 'gram //
NK039(ti)013:9: ma g.yos rdo rje'i rlab bskyod rak+ta'i mtsho //
NK039(ti)013:10: ma rnyog mu le thod pa'i sku mkhar nas //
NK039(ti)013:11: ma mo dus bzhi'i rgyal mo dbyings phyug ma //
NK039(ti)013:12: ma cig e ka dza ti khros ma nag /
NK039(ti)013:13: ma sprul nying bzhi sha za mu kha le //
NK039(ti)013:15: ma lus pu hasti yis g.yab kyin 'bod //
NK039(ti)013:16: ma 'gyang thogs med gnas 'dir gshegs nas kyang //
NK039(ti)013:17: ma pheb kun tu bzang mo yum lnga'i mkhar //
NK039(ti)013:18: ma spang chos nyid 'phrul gyi pho brang dbus //
NK039(ti)013:19: ma chags pad nyi ston la tish+thana tu //
NK039(ti)013:20: ma gus spangs pa'i ga bu chung brtul zhugs //
NK039(ti)013:21: ma la gdung ba'i rnam 'gyur sa ma d+hir //
NK039(ti)013:22: ma nyung rdul snyed sprul pa'i gar dang bcas //
NK039(ti)013:23: ma dmigs mnyam pa'i klong nas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK039(ti)013:24: ma dag rnam rtog mtha' 'das kun tu bzang //
NK039(ti)013:25: ma sbar mchod pa nyer spyod nam mkha'i khams //
NK039(ti)013:26: ma yangs dog gor byas pa'i rgya mtsho'i rdul //
NK039(ti)013:27: ma chen r+ae ma ti la 'bul bar bgyi //
NK039(ti)013:28: ma spangs rang byung dbyings kyi k+aa pa lar //
NK039(ti)013:29: ma h+aa sha lnga bdud rtsi'i b+ha ling+ta //
NK039(ti)013:30: ma bcos rtsa brgyad stong sbyar byang chub sems //
NK039(ti)013:31: ma yi b+ha gar rgyu lnga bsgral khrag bcas //
NK039(ti)013:32: ma la gzhan yang thugs dam skongs ba'i rdzas //
NK039(ti)013:33: ma 'dzin phyi nang rtog pa'i d+r+wa ba kun //
NK039(ti)013:34: ma rnams bskyed pa'i klong cher gang ba ru //
NK039(ti)013:35: ma nyid bsten phyir 'bul la bstod par bya //
NK039(ti)013:36: ma thugs stong nyid khro ba ma mchis mod //
NK039(ti)013:37: ma 'khor dregs pa'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK039(ti)013:38: ma gzhan kun brtag gnyug mar dengs pa yi //
NK039(ti)013:39: ma gnas yongs grub klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK039(ti)013:40: ma la gshe zhing bdag la 'khu ba yis //
NK039(ti)013:41: ma rung gdug pa'i du ru sha la sogs //
NK039(ti)013:42: ma bzhag rnam thar gsum ldan hom khung du //
NK039(ti)013:43: ma 'gor myur du bstan dgra la kh+aa h+ai //
NK039(ti)013:44: ma brjed byang chub shing drung sh+aaka thub dang //
NK039(ti)013:45: ma yis mar me mdzad drung khas blangs ltar //
NK039(ti)013:46: ma gyur bde byed bstan dang bstan 'dzin dag /
NK039(ti)013:47: ma nus shugs phyung 'phel zhing rgyas par mdzod //
NK039(ti)013:48: ma la mos pa'i rnal 'byor bdag cag kun //
NK039(ti)013:49: ma bor 'bral med grib ma bzhin 'grogs shing //
NK039(ti)013:50: ma 'da' ci bcol las bzhi'i bya ba kun //
NK039(ti)013:51: ma g.yel thogs med 'grub pa'i bkra shis mdzod //
NK039(ti)013:52: ces pa'ang nyag gter ston chen po byang chub rgyal
NK039(ti)013:53: mtshan gyis bka' las gsungs pa ltar bya ba sems
NK039(ti)013:54: te / gnas mchog karma 'od 'bar smug chung gi
NK039(ti)013:55: 'gram dpal 'byor dgon du sprul ming chos kyi rgyal
NK039(ti)013:56: mtshan pas bris pa ma mo dgyes shing rgyal bstan
NK039(ti)013:57: mtha' dag srung ba la thogs pa med par gyur
